description:
Slip these little boot dryers into your wet shoes and 2-5 hours later you’ll have dry shoes, simple as that. The Travel Dry DX circulates warm air throughout your shoes, so they are warm and dry when you need them. The included adapter lets you plug your Travel Dry DX into your car’s 12V port.

  • Average drying time is 2-5 hours
  • Internal fans circulate warm air throughout your footwear
  • Powered by a standard household outlet or your car’s 12V port
  • Compact design is easy to take along on a road-trip or holiday, if you are running or hiking in the rain, you’ll be glad you have it
  • Dimensions: 6.4 x 16.5 x 5.7cm
name: DryGuy Shoe  & Boot Travel Dry DX
